quotes.quote_content: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote_content: It's never too late to have a happy childhood.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote_content: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote_content: Any fool can know. The point is to understand.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote_content: Do your thing and don't care if they like it.
quotes.author: Tina Fey
